--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "stack@a..." <stack@a...>
wrote:
 
> Are you thinking that you would not be able to get to the remote
machine 
> because there is a firewall in the way blocking port 80?  Would you
be 
> able to get an ssh session into the remote machine in your scenario?

Yes, it's the firewall because our system adm hits with a firewall
whenever he gets a chance. But I think using ssh with a remote machine
would be ok.
